channel.title: Get CS3 to last forever!-different way
channel.description:
first of all I would like to say credits to Irish.
First off go to http://labs.adobe.com/ (you will have to register) After downloading and installing locate the CS3 file. (If you are having trouble finding it search for cs3 with search function, the one in the start menu.) After opening the folder AMT locate file: application.sif . Change the name of the file to application._sif there! Done
Note! if it stops working just rename the file: application._sif to application.sif run photoshop close then rename it back to: application._sif remeber credits to Irish.

item.title: Get CS3 to last forever!-different way
item.dc:creator: @blah_bah7 blah bah7
item.description:
@blah_bah7 wrote:

[quote=“I Coke I, post:19, topic:95741”][quote author=FastBawlz link=topic=138285.msg1346161#msg1346161 date=1179647533]

sweet. I guess I’ll give it a go.
and thanks in advance for the patch. It should come in handy

YW… DO NOT TRY A KeyGen …

They do generate keys…

But Adobe is cracking down… Now you can only use a serial on 1 computer…
[/quote]
Half of they keys they generate still work, though.[/quote]

so when it says that youve reached the activation limit you just have to generate a new key?

Read full topic

exps35:

So is CS3 worth the download now? Does it run smoothly, and have they gotten rid of most of the bugs?

It runs smoother then CS2 runs Smart filter is nice… I haven’t tried the animation and 3D stuff yet… I’ll give it a go later…
